text: Anyone in the professional services space willing to share high-level learnings in channel mix? been hard charging for 18 months at a consulting company. still don’t feel we’ve nailed the right investment of dollars and resources or have the data to speak to where to optimize investment. to whit, I don’t expect google to be the chief source of lead gen for valuable consulting products, but trying to gauge if money & time are over-invested there at the expense of email blasts/list buying, organic content development&promotion, traditional PR efforts, and so on. any learnings other practitioners are willing to share about expectations in this space. (independent of any market effects from covid)

text: I'm in professional services and I'd be happy to chat further. Shoot me a DM and I can give you my email.
